title: Another terror attack, another thoughtless Trump tweetstorm
text: Late last month, as the investigation of possible ties between Russia and the 2016 Trump campaign dominated the headlines, The Wall Street Journal reported that Trump was considering asking lawyers to screen his tweets. Maybe someone from the State Department should also be involved. Trump's tweets about Russia aren't the only ones that need to be subjected to extreme vetting.
summary:
Late last month, as the investigation of possible ties between Russia and the 2016 Trump campaign dominated the headlines, The Wall Street Journal reported that Trump was considering asking lawyers to screen his tweets.
Maybe someone from the State Department should also be involved.
Trump's tweets about Russia aren't the only ones that need to be subjected to extreme vetting.
